oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sagebrush Roundup - 1941-mm-dd - Part 2 (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WMMN's Sagebrush Roundup radio program, Philip Morris Tobacco audition part 2 (incomplete recording). Featuring the Trail Blazers (Jack Dunigan, Gertrude Miller, with Earl 'Little' Sampson), Enoch 'Eli' Haney, Sammy Nancy (accordionist, spelling unconfirmed), Uncle Rufus (comedian), the Blue Bonnet Girls, Arizona Rusty Gabbard (Arthur Gabbard), and host Howard Hopkins Wolfe. Recording begins with a false start of the opening theme.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Blue Bonnet Girls; Arizona Rusty Gabbard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (false start) -- Ida, Sweet As Apple Cider ([Unidentified performers]) [continued from part 1] -- Howard Hopkins Wolfe introduces the Blue Bonnet Girls -- He Bore It All (Blue Bonnet Girls) -- Howard Hopkins Wolfe introduces Arizona Rusty Gabbard -- When Payday Rolls Around (Arizona Rusty Gabbard) [interrupted, incomplete] -- [Unidentified organ music]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WMMN (Radio station : Fairmont, W. Va.); Sagebrush roundup (Radio program); Wolfe, Howard Hopkins; Trail Blazers (Musical group : Jack Dunigan); Dunigan, Jack, 1909-1993; Miller, Gertrude, 1915-1967; Sampson, Earl Little, 1917-2004; Haney, Enoch; Blue Bonnet Girls (Musical group); Gabbard, Rusty
